From Trucks, Excavators to Computer Software. With 60 month terms and low interest rates you can grow your business in no time with the best equipment available. Requirements are 3 months business bank statements, an application and invoice(s) for equipment you are looking to purchase. Also, $10,000 per month in consistent revenue. Learn More…[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.10.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_blurb title=”Merchant Cash Advance” image=”https://bccapital.info/wp-content/uploads/2021/10/Merchant-Cash-Advance-Services-for-Business-Professionals.jpg” alt=”Professional business seeking merchant cash advance” _builder_version=”4.13.0″ _module_preset=”default” header_level=”h3″ header_font=”|800|||||||” header_font_size=”25px” header_letter_spacing=”1px” custom_margin=”-25px||||false|false” custom_padding=”10px|10px|15px|10px|false|true” border_radii=”on|3px|3px|3px|3px” border_width_all=”1px” border_color_all=”#F1B821″ border_radii_image=”on|2px|2px|2px|2px” border_width_all_image=”1px” border_color_all_image=”#006C3E” box_shadow_style=”preset3″ box_shadow_color=”#F1B821″ locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”]Our most popular program, the MCA or revenue based financing allows a business to get real cash into their account within 24 hours. Unsecured, non-bank business funding makes it easy to achieve capital and grow your company. Requirements are 3 months business bank statements, an application, and at least $10,000 per month in consistent revenue. Learn More…[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.10.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_blurb title=”Credit Restoration” image=”https://bccapital.info/wp-content/uploads/2021/09/Credit-Restoration-Brooklyn-NY.jpg” alt=”Credit Restoration Brooklyn NY” _builder_version=”4.13.0″ _module_preset=”default” header_level=”h3″ header_font=”|800|||||||” header_font_size=”25px” header_letter_spacing=”1px” custom_padding=”10px|10px|15px|10px|false|true” border_radii=”on|3px|3px|3px|3px” border_width_all=”1px” border_color_all=”#F1B821″ border_radii_image=”on|2px|2px|2px|2px” border_width_all_image=”1px” border_color_all_image=”#006C3E” box_shadow_style=”preset3″ box_shadow_blur=”15px” box_shadow_spread=”-10px” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”]
With a team of experts in house we can go in and clean negative items off of your credit, boost your score, and open up the doors for tier 1 borrowing for you. All that is needed is an on phone consultation to start.

Learn More…

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ _builder_version=”4.10.3″ _module_preset=”default” custom_margin=”50px|auto||auto||” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.10.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_cta title=”How do I get started with Business Funding?” button_url=”https://bccapital.info/contact/” button_text=”Speak to Consultant” module_id=”get-started” _builder_version=”4.11.3″ _module_preset=”default” header_font=”|800|||||||” background_color=”#006C3E” header_text_shadow_style=”preset1″ global_colors_info=”{}”]

You may call in, email or visit us on the web to begin the application process. A free consultation comes with every call to any qualfied business owner. An account manager and funding specialist will assist in your process from submission to approval, to presenting the terms. Conditions, and funding.

[/et_pb_cta][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.10.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_image _builder_version=”4.10.8″ text_font=”||||||||” header_font=”||||||||” header_2_font=”|600|||||||” header_2_font_size=”40px” header_2_letter_spacing=”1px” header_2_line_height=”1.4em” header_3_font=”Poppins|700||on|||||” header_3_text_color=”#F1B821″ header_3_font_size=”18px” header_3_letter_spacing=”1px” header_3_line_height=”2em” custom_margin=”||-1px|||” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Merchant Cash Advance for business of all sizes

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_divider color=”#edbb5f” divider_weight=”2px” _builder_version=”3.2″ max_width=”60px” module_alignment=”left” height=”2px” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_divider][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.10.8″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Often small businesses require money for paying expenses like repairs, salaries and making stock purchases. Applying for a business advance from a bank or other lender is often time consuming. Also banks may not lend money to businesses which do not have a good credit score. Hence businesses which has consistent monthly revenue in sales, will find it convenient to apply for a merchant cash advance (MCA). The process of applying for a MCA is fairly simple and quick, and there are many benefits of applying for a MCA for Small Business Financing which are described below.

For a merchant cash advance

The funder will give a cash advance to the business if the business meets certain qualifying criteria. One of the main requirements is that monthly gross business revenue should be above a specified amount, typically $10,000. The MCA is available to well established businesses, the business should be at least six months old. The funder will also fix a factor rate for the cash advance, and the business will have to repay the MCA amount X factor rate. For repayment, the funder will usually deduct a percentage from the daily business sales directly, typically the percentage varies between 10-20%. So the business can repay the advance depending on the sales.

Benefits of MCA

 Since the MCA repayment is linked to sales, there is more flexibility for repayment of the cash advance for the business, especially businesses with seasonal sales. The processing time for the cash advance is far less than the bank, usually 24 hours or less, so it is preferred by businesses which require the advance quickly. The funder will also not focus on the credit score, they are more interested in the sales history for the business, making it ideal for pre-existing businesses. Also no collateral is required.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button button_url=”https://bccapital.info/application/” button_text=”Apply Today for Merchant Cash Advance” button_alignment=”left” _builder_version=”4.10.8″ _module_preset=”default” custom_button=”on” button_text_color=”#6D6E70″ button_border_color=”#6D6E70″ button_use_icon=”off” custom_margin=”||||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_button][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.13.0″ _module_preset=”default” text_font_size=”25px” custom_margin=”-20px||||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”]

theme_builder_area=”post_content”]

Call: 800-515-4126

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”3_5″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”5%|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text module_id=”eq-financing” _builder_version=”4.10.8″ _module_preset=”default” header_2_font=”|800|||||||” header_2_font_size=”40px” header_2_line_height=”1.3em” custom_padding=”|29px||34px||” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Secure The Right Equipment Financing

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_divider color=”#F1B821″ divider_weight=”2px” _builder_version=”4.10.3″ max_width=”60px” module_alignment=”left” height=”2px” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_divider][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.10.8″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”|29px||33px||” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Many small business leaders will need some kind of financing options. The equipment financing is a smart deal which will work in time too. The deals are on the rise and leaders can take advantage of the select options. The people will be eager to learn all that they can about Equipment Financing. The lender will offer a wide range of equipment, which can be delivered on site. The best deals are those which are manageable and will be delivered in a timely fashion too. Trust that the team will live up to the expectations, giving people a better look as well.

The first thing to do for Equipment Financing

Just call the help desk for more insight. The pro team on the phone will guide a new client through the best offers of business funding in time. The people can rely upon the skilled team that they call on the phone. The help desk has received some rave reviews from the former client base. The clients want to learn a lot about the best projects in time as well. The best Equipment Financing will be a top bet for the people as well. Equipment Financing has caught on among the smart business owners. They can get the right deals and not waste their time on the special offers. The new customers are then free to write their own new reviews. Those new reviews do help the team learn about their clients.

 Cost of Equipment Financing

The cost of equipment financing can go as low as 6% APR, and high risk programs are available. Terms normally range from 2-6 years.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.10.8″ _module_preset=”default” background_image=”https://bccapital.info/wp-content/uploads/2021/09/Software-Company-for-Financial-Assistance.jpg” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ _builder_version=”4.10.7″ _module_preset=”default” width=”100%” max_width=”1200px” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.10.7″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”rgba(105,105,105,0.93)” custom_padding=”25px|20px|25px|20px|true|true” border_radii=”on|2px|2px|2px|2px” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text module_id=”credit-restoration” _builder_version=”4.10.8″ text_font=”||||||||” header_font=”||||||||” header_2_font=”|700|||||||” header_2_font_size=”40px” header_2_letter_spacing=”1px” header_2_line_height=”1.4em” header_3_font=”Poppins|700||on|||||” header_3_text_color=”#F1B821″ header_3_font_size=”18px” header_3_letter_spacing=”1px” header_3_line_height=”2em” background_layout=”dark” max_width=”550px” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Credit Restoration

What We Can Do For You

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_divider color=”#edbb5f” divider_weight=”2px” _builder_version=”3.2″ max_width=”60px” module_alignment=”left” height=”2px” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_divider][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.11.1″ text_font=”Poppins||||||||” text_font_size=”16px” text_letter_spacing=”1px” text_line_height=”2em” background_layout=”dark” max_width=”550px” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Credit restoration is extremely important in the world of finance. Better scores the opportunies there is to finance equipment for a business. SBA loans are more acceptable to a clear credit rating and much more advantages that comes along with credit restoration.

Speak to a consultant today to assist with your credit clean and get you back to a positive position to buying power with finance. Also connect with us on LinkedIn.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.10.7″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.10.7″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row column_structure=”3_4,1_4″ module_id=”COVID-19-EIDL” _builder_version=”4.10.8″ _module_preset=”default” width=”100%” max_width=”1200px” custom_padding=”25px|20px|25px|20px|true|true” border_radii=”on|2px|2px|2px|2px” border_width_all=”1px” border_color_all=”#006C3E” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”3_4″ _builder_version=”4.10.7″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.10.7″ _module_preset=”default” header_3_font=”|800|||||||” header_3_font_size=”40px” global_colors_info=”{}”]
